channel.title: Compiler help :(
channel.description:
I followed mod taharoks tut on how to make a server, i was using tos-scape (test-scape based) as a source, when i run compiler.bat it comes up with this
Note: Stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated AVI. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. Press any key to continue...
When i press something, it closes, can someone help me please?

item.title: Compiler help :(
item.dc:creator: @kingjibs96 kingjibs96
item.description:
@kingjibs96 wrote:

can some one help me?
i got a test scape source
when i compile it says something like javac is not recognised as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file.
’
and also when i try and run server a screen comes up and then goes.?
do you know what to do
iv been on afew guides and if u tell me to edit my compiler i dont have the option unless u mean veiw file but then it doesnt let me paste or delete only copy.
plz help

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help :(
item.dc:creator: @Volrom Volrom
item.description:
@Volrom wrote:

Here is a complete guide type of thing to help you and your “problem”. Please +rep if this was useful!

First of all, you have no error, as the first/second poster said. Everything is correct, but what might be the problem is you Java JDK version. Do you have jdk1.6.0.0_4? If you don’t, thats probably the mistake. You see, JDK 6u4 contains a small file set (Meaning .EXE and a .JAR) that help run your server (Making it available on the web for annoymous access). Thats pretty much all that they updated in JDK 6u4. Even if you have JDK 6u3, it won’t be as reliable with your server, so it may make it crash with an annoymous Java error such as this one:

If this tutorial/post doesn’t help you, then i suggest talking to a Moderator (Smarter for one thing), or go to Sun.com and email them about your problem.
If you have any other questions, just post a topic and pm me (So i know what the name of the topic is, ect…).

-Volrom

Read full topic
